iphone16.title: iPhone 16 Details
details: iPhone 16 Series (2024):
Models: iPhone 16, iPhone 16 Plus, iPhone 16 Pro, iPhone 16 Pro Max.
Display: Super Retina XDR OLED; sizes range from 6.1 inches to 6.9 inches.
Camera: Advanced camera systems with 48MP main sensors; Pro models offer enhanced features like 4K120 fps in Dolby Vision and spatial photos/videos.
Processor: A18 Bionic chip; A18 Pro chip in Pro models.
Storage Options: 128GB, 256GB, 512GB; up to 1TB on Pro models.
Notable Features: Introduction of a new Camera Control button, enhanced AI capabilities branded as Apple Intelligence, and improved battery life.

iphone15.title: iPhone 15 Details
details: iPhone 15 Series (2023):
Models: iPhone 15, iPhone 15 Plus, iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro Max.
Display: Super Retina XDR OLED; sizes range from 6.1 inches to 6.7 inches.
Camera: Further improvements in camera technology, including enhanced computational photography and improved telephoto capabilities on Pro models.
Processor: A17 Bionic chip.
Storage Options: Up to 1TB on Pro models.
Notable Features: Introduction of USB-C connectivity, improved battery efficiency, and advanced AI features.

iphone14.title: iPhone 14 Details
details: iPhone 14 Series (2022):
Models: iPhone 14, iPhone 14 Plus, iPhone 14 Pro, iPhone 14 Pro Max.
Display: Super Retina XDR OLED; sizes range from 6.1 inches to 6.7 inches.
Camera: Enhanced camera systems with improved low-light performance; Pro models feature a 48MP main sensor.
Processor: A16 Bionic chip in Pro models; A15 Bionic in standard models.
Storage Options: Up to 1TB on Pro models.
Notable Features: Dynamic Island on Pro models, Always-On display, satellite connectivity for emergency SOS.

iphone13.title: iPhone 13 Details
details: iPhone 13 Series (2021):
Models: iPhone 13 mini, iPhone 13, iPhone 13 Pro, iPhone 13 Pro Max.
Display: Super Retina XDR OLED; sizes range from 5.4 inches (mini) to 6.7 inches (Pro Max).
Camera: Improved dual-camera system on iPhone 13 models; enhanced triple-camera system with sensor-shift stabilization on Pro models.
Processor: A15 Bionic chip.
Storage Options: Up to 1TB on Pro models.
Notable Features: Smaller notch, ProMotion display (120Hz) on Pro models, improved battery life.

iphone12.title: iPhone 12 Details
details: iPhone 12 Series (2020):
Models: iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 Pro, iPhone 12 Pro Max.
Display: Super Retina XDR OLED; sizes range from 5.4 inches (mini) to 6.7 inches (Pro Max).
Camera: Dual-camera system on iPhone 12 models; triple-camera system with LiDAR Scanner on Pro models.
Processor: A14 Bionic chip.
Storage Options: Up to 512GB on Pro models.
Notable Features: 5G connectivity, Ceramic Shield front cover, MagSafe support.

iphone11.title: iPhone 11 Details
details: iPhone 11 (2019):
Display: 6.1-inch Liquid Retina HD LCD with a resolution of 1792x828 pixels at 326 ppi.
Camera: Dual 12MP system with Ultra Wide and Wide lenses; 12MP front camera.
Processor: A13 Bionic chip.
Storage Options: 64GB, 128GB, 256GB.
Notable Features: Face ID, Haptic Touch, IP68 water and dust resistance.
